original_text: Very bad troubles will happen to people at that time and cause them a lot of pain. Nothing as bad has ever happened before, since God created the world. Nothing as bad will ever happen again.
korean_text: 이는 그 날들이 환난의 날이 되겠음이라 하나님께서 창조하신 시초부터 지금까지 이런 환난이 없었고 후에도 없으리라

sentences.original_text: Very bad troubles will happen to people at that time
sentences.korean_translation: 매우 나쁜 재난이 그 때 사람들에게 일어날 것이다

sentences.original_text: and cause them a lot of pain
Nothing as bad has ever happened before
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 나쁜 일은 일어난 적이 없었다

sentences.original_text: Nothing as bad will ever happen again
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 나쁜 일은 다시는 일어나지 않을 것이다
